ModMetaData.name: Dwarven Crafts (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: cuproPanda
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/WAEzk68.png[/img] Update of cuproPandas mod https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=13400.0
[img]https://i.imgur.com/7Gzt3Rg.png[/img]
[table] [tr] [td][url=https://invite.gg/Mlie][img]https://i.imgur.com/zdzzBrc.png[/img][/url][/td] [td][url=https://github.com/emipa606/DwarvenCrafts][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url][/td] [/tr] [/table]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/NOW7jU1.png[/img]
Adds small things to craft and sell to traders. Drinkware offers two tiers of crafting.
Items Added: Metal Goblets: Crafted using steel, silver, or gold Stone Mugs: Crafted using stone blocks Wooden Cups: Crafted using wood Small Pots: Crafted using steel, copper, or silver Large Pots: Crafted using steel, copper, or silver Bowls: Crafted using stone blocks, steel, or wood Utensils: Crafted using steel, silver, gold, or wood Figurine: Crafted using metallic, stony, or woody materials
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Rs6T6cr.png[/img] [list] [*] See if the the error persists if you just have this mod and its requirements active. [*] If not, try adding your other mods until it happens again. [*] Post your error-log using [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=818773962]HugsLib[/url] and command Ctrl+F12 [*] For best support, please use the Discord-channel for error-reporting. [*] Do not report errors by making a discussion-thread, I get no notification of that. [*] If you have the solution for a problem, please post it to the GitHub repository. [/list]
